20110109190654.000|20110109190655.000|CC1|GENERATORS THAT YOU FIRE UP,    
20110109190655.000|20110109190656.000|CC1|THEY ARE BIG POWER PLANTS THAT  
20110109190656.000|20110109190658.000|CC1|CAN'T SHUT DOWN AT NIGHT, YOU   
20110109190658.000|20110109190700.000|CC1|MUST KEEP THEM RUNNING.         
20110109190700.000|20110109190702.000|CC1|INDEED THEY OFTEN PUMP WATER

20110109190704.000|20110109190705.000|CC1|DOWN HILL DURING THE DAY WHEN   
20110109190705.000|20110109190706.000|CC1|THEY NEED THAT PEAK.

20110109190709.000|20110109190710.000|CC1|FREEEE ELECTRONS IF YOU WILL    
20110109190710.000|20110109190712.000|CC1|THAT ARE AVAILABLE NIGHTTIME.   
20110109190712.000|20110109190713.000|CC1|SO THAT'S ONE THING.            
20110109190713.000|20110109190714.000|CC1|THE OTHER GREAT THING ABOUT     
20110109190714.000|20110109190716.000|CC1|ELECTRICS IS THE FOLLOWING, YOU 
20110109190716.000|20110109190717.000|CC1|CANNOT MAKE GASOLINE ON THE ROOF
